message: I propose a fair 90/10 split.  I'm happy to share a larger portion with you if you're willing to accept this offer.
I'll take 60, you get 40. That's a good starting point, but I'm willing to negotiate further if you want more.
I think we can both do better. Let's meet in the middle. I'll take 55, and you can have 45.  I'm confident we can find a mutually beneficial agreement.
Let's split it 50/50. It's a fair and simple solution. I'm willing to compromise and meet you in the middle.
